ActCanada Labour Code
PrecisAppointment of ALLISON SMITH of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a Vice-Chairperson of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, on a full-time basis, effective January 5, 2015.
